name: CodeCombat Computer Science Courses
description: Game-based coding platform teaching Python and JavaScript through interactive gameplay. Students write real code to control characters and solve puzzles across multiple worlds.

name: CodeCombat Python Programming Track
description: Learn Python programming through adventure-based gameplay. Covers fundamentals including variables, loops, functions, and object-oriented programming in an engaging fantasy setting.

name: CodeCombat JavaScript Programming Track
description: Master JavaScript fundamentals through game-based learning. Build coding skills while playing through dungeons, solving puzzles, and defeating enemies with code.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, JavaScript, Web Development

name: CodeCombat Classroom Edition
description: Teacher-facilitated coding curriculum with classroom management tools. Includes progress tracking, lesson plans, and assessment features for educators teaching programming.
